name: Super Rude Bear Resurrection
description: Super Rude Bear Resurrection is an ultra-tight, masocore platformer that anyone can beat! Use your corpses to get ahead, or take on the ultimate challenge and try to defeat the entire game without dying!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz processor equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU, 1GB VRAM+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Best enjoyed with a twin stick controller (e.g. Dualshock 4)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: i5 Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 4GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: DS4
